header.#text:
Repeal of the
			 Payment, Clearing, and Settlement Supervision Act of 2010

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Financial Stability Act of 2010 to repeal
		  certain designation authority of the Financial Stability Oversight Council, to
		  repeal the Payment, Clearing, and Settlement Supervision Act of 2010, and for
		  other purposes.
